EmailTemplate.name: 201909_Americas_StandardAero_PEEF_PEAF_kcr.201909_Americas_StandardAero_PEEF+PEA
EmailTemplate.subject: ✈ Fly into 2020 with State of the Art Cockpit Technology!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/]]> <[[http://standardaero.com/]]>
Don’t miss your chance to take advantage of special discounts when you upgrade your cockpit with Primus Elite Enhanced Features and Primus Elite Advanced Features with Synthetic Vision. In addition to a special discount when you bundle these offerings, you are eligible to save 50% on Honeywell’s SmartRunway/SmartLanding, the leading safety solution that reduces white-knuckle approaches and takeoffs at challenging airports.
These discounts are only available for a limited time so don’t delay.
Click below to learn more about these offerings and to contact StandardAero to request a quote.
CONTACT STANDARDAERO <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/StandardAero_PEEF_PEAF.html?utm_source=email&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=19_ch_amer_bga_stda_peef-peaf]]>
